**December 13, 2024**  
I have been accepted to pursue a Master's degree in Applied Mathematics and Data Science at the [School of Applied Mathematics](https://emap.fgv.br/en) (FGV EMAp). Even though I'm not accepting the offer, I'm very grateful for the opportunity and excited to continue my journey in Political Science at [IESP-UERJ](https://www.iesp.uerj.br/).

**November 26, 2024**  
I have successfully delivered my undergraduate thesis, marking the official completion of my dual degrees in Data Science & Artificial Intelligence from the [School of Applied Mathematics](https://emap.fgv.br/en) (FGV EMAp) and Social Sciences from the [Superior School of Social Sciences](https://cpdoc.fgv.br/en) (FGV CPDOC). I'm very grateful for the support of my family, friends, and advisors throughout this journey, which I'm very proud of.

**November 21, 2024**  
I have been [accepted](https://iesp.uerj.br/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Aprovados-por-ordem-de-classificacao-Ciencia-Politica.pdf) in the first position to pursue a Master's degree in Political Science at the Institute of Social and Political Studies ([IESP-UERJ](https://www.iesp.uerj.br/)), starting in March 2025. This opportunity will allow me to contribute to impactful research, particularly in the application of Data Science and AI to the field.
